submission:
class Solution:
    def countSubarrays(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
                from collections import defaultdict
                n = len(nums)
                count = 0
                vis=set()
                prevseen = defaultdict(int)

                for i in range(n):
                    currseen = defaultdict(int)
                    vis.add(i)
                    if nums[i] == k:
                        count += 1
                    currseen[nums[i]] = 1

                    for val, freq in prevseen.items():
                        seenres = val & nums[i]
                        if seenres == k:
                            count += freq
                        currseen[seenres] += freq
                    vis.remove(i)
                    
                    prevseen = currseen
                
                return count
